content: poppy for remembrance these poppies are easy to make - crocheted in one piece with an optional added leaf requirements small amount of red double knitting yarn scrap of black yarn small amount of green yarn the leaf is optional a badge pin or safety pin if it is to be worn 3 5mm crochet hook this pattern uses uk terminology ~ a lovely decoration lest we forget **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
